languages.text: "Именно ради таких как ты Император даровал династиям священные Патенты".
"It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."
languages.original_text: "Именно ради таких как ты Император даровал династиям священные Патенты".

traits.locale_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."
"It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

"It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

languages.text: 「あなたのような方がいるからこそ、皇帝陛下は帝国の貴族たちに聖なる令状を授けたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのような方がいるからこそ、皇帝陛下は帝国の貴族たちに聖なる令状を授けたのでしょう」

languages.text: "Es liegt an Individuen wie Euch, dass der Imperator den Dynastien des Imperiums die heiligen Handelsbriefe gewährt hat."
languages.original_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

traits.locale_text: "Es liegt an Individuen wie Euch, dass der Imperator den Dynastien des Imperiums die heiligen Handelsbriefe gewährt hat."

languages.text: « C'est parce qu'il existe des individus de votre envergure que l'Empereur a octroyé les lettres de marque sacrées aux dynasties de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

traits.locale_text: « C'est parce qu'il existe des individus de votre envergure que l'Empereur a octroyé les lettres de marque sacrées aux dynasties de l'Imperium. »

languages.text: «Es por individuos como usted que el Emperador otorgó la Sagrada Patente a las dinastías del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

traits.locale_text: «Es por individuos como usted que el Emperador otorgó la Sagrada Patente a las dinastías del Imperium».

languages.text: “正是因为当初有像你这样的人，帝皇才决定将帝国的神圣授状赐予众多王朝。”
languages.original_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

traits.locale_text: “正是因为当初有像你这样的人，帝皇才决定将帝国的神圣授状赐予众多王朝。”

languages.text: "Senin gibiler sayesinde İmparator, İmparatorluk hanedanlıklarına kutsal Ruhsatnameler bağışladı."
languages.original_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."

traits.locale_text: "Sizin gibiler sayesinde İmparator, İmparatorluk'un hanedanlıklarına kutsal Ruhsatnameler bağışladı."

languages.original_text: "It is because of individuals like you that the Emperor granted the sacred Warrants to the Imperium's dynasties."
